common.title: Hemmelig.app
common.description: Share secrets securely with encrypted messages that automatically self-destruct after being read.
common.content_description: Enter the secret message you want to share securely
common.security_description: Configure security settings for your secret
common.secret_description: Share this URL with the person who needs to access the secret
common.one_time_use: This secret can only be viewed once and will self-destruct after being read.

home.title: Account
home.first_time_message: If this is the first time you sign in on this user account, you should go to Account settings and update your password
home.intro: We are glad you logged in. Here is the list of features signed in users get
home.expiration: Expiration time of 14 and 28 days for secrets
home.more: More features are coming! Thanks for joining Hemmelig.app!

account.can_not_update_profile: Could not update your user profile
account.do_you_want_delete: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?

secrets.do_you_want_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this secret?

settings.readonly_only_for_non_admin: Should the Hemmelig instance be read only for non admin users?
settings.disable_signin: Should user sign in be disabled?
settings.disable_user_account_creation_descriptio: Do not allow users to create a new account. As an admin, you will still be able to create new user accounts
settings.disable_file_upload_description: Disable file upload for your instance
settings.restrict_organization_email_description: This will limit user registration for a certain email domain

users.creator: Creator
users.do_you_want_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.have_to_be_admin: You have to be an admin to view the users

session.expire: Your session is about to expire. Do you want to extend it?

home.app_subtitle: Paste a password, confidential message, or private data.
home.welcome: Ensure your sensitive data remains encrypted, secure, and confidential.
home.title: Title
home.burn_aftertime: Burn the secret only after the time expires
home.restrict_from_ip: Restrict the secret from being opened based on an IP or a CIDR range. Example CIDR: 192.168.1.0/24.
home.public_no_upload: Public pastes do not allow file uploads
home.or: Separate the link and decryption key
home.link_only_works_once: The secret link, by default, is a one-time use only, after which it will vanish.
home.title_description: Give your secret a memorable title (optional)
home.ttl_description: Set how long the secret should be available
home.max_views_description: Number of times the secret can be viewed
home.burn_description: The secret will be permanently deleted after being read
home.burn_aftertime: Burn the secret only after the time expires

secret.will_show_once: By default we will only show the secret once.
secret.password_required: A password is required to open this secret

signin.title: Sign in
signin.heading: Everything you need to access and manage the Hemmelig secrets.
signin.wrong_credentials: Wrong username or password. Please try again.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.heading: Everything you need to access and manage the Hemmelig secrets.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.description: Oops! It seems this secret has vanished into thin air. Don't worry though, you can create a new one or check out our documentation.
